name: Encore fails
description: The move Encore will fail if this move was used last by its target.

name: Me First fails
description: The move Me First will fail if this move was used last by its target.

name: Future attack
description: This move triggers an attack in the future.

name: Affected by Pressure
description: This move is affected by Pressure, even if it doesn't target that Pokémon.

name: Combo move
description: This move can be part of a combo.

name: Ignored by Sleep Talk
description: This move cannot be selected by Sleep Talk.

name: Ignored by Assist
description: This move cannot be selected by Assist.

name: Copycat fails
description: The move Copycat will fail if this move was used last by its target.

name: Mimic fails
description: The move Mimic will fail if this move was used last by its target.

name: Instruct fails
description: The move Instruct will fail if this move was used last by its target.

name: Powder or spore move
description: Grass-type Pokémon, Pokémon with Overcoat, and Pokémon holding Safety Goggles are immune to this move.

name: Biting move
description: This move receives a 50% power boost from Strong Jaw.

name: Ball or bomb move
description: Pokémon with Bulletproof are immune to this move.

name: No Parental Bond
description: Parental Bond will not turn this move into a two-hit move.

name: No effectiveness message
description: This move will not display as "super effective" or "not very effective."

name: Boosted by Sheer Force
description: This move receives a 30% power boost from Sheer Force regardless of having a traditional secondary effect.

name: Slicing move
description: This move receives a 50% power boost from Sharpness.

name: Wind move
description: This move triggers Wind Rider and Wind Power.

name: Can't be used consecutively
description: This move cannot be used twice in a row.

name: Can't be Sketched
description: The move Sketch will fail if this move was used last by its target.
